Production Co: Adventure Pictures, BBC Films, British Film Institute
Synopsis: A day in the life of Leo and his daughter, Molly, as she grapples with the challenges of her father's chaotic mind. As they weave their way through New York City, Leo's journey takes on a hallucinatory quality as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, leading Molly to wrestle with her own path as she considers her future.
Title: The Roads Not Taken
